name: Disable Windows IIS HTTP Logging
description: Disables HTTP logging on a Windows IIS web server as seen by Threat Group 3390 (Bronze Union)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\appcmd.exe AND process.command_line:*set* AND process.command_line:*config* AND process.command_line:*\/section\:httplogging* AND process.command_line:*\/dontLog\:true*)`
